system.description: This spell functions like glyph of warding, except that a greater blast glyph deals up to 10d8 points of damage (Reflex half), and a greater spell glyph can store a spell of 6th level or lower. You trace the glyph with incense sprinkled with powdered diamond worth at least 400 gp.

components.materialDescription: Incense sprinkled with powdered diamond worth at least 400 gp.

system.savingThrow: Reflex half (blast glyph) or varies (spell glyph)
